Title: Makes contractors ineligible to bid for a public work contract if prevailing rate wages and supplements due from all prior public work contracts remain unpaid
Summary: Makes contractors ineligible to bid for a public work contract if prevailing rate wages and supplements due from all prior public work contracts remain unpaid.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to making contractors ineligible to bid for a public work contract if prevailing rate wages and supplements due from a prior public work contract remain unpaid
